entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:39 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 06:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -30.8°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blizzard developing late this morning. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this evening then snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 38. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
